mapper.select: select id, user_name as userName, event_type as eventType, sum(yxb) as yxb, max(current_yxb) as currentYxb, sum(times) times, log_time as logTime from yxb_incr where 1=1 and user_name =#{userName} and event_type in (#{item}) and log_day> #{startTime} and log_day< #{endTime} group by log_time,user_name,event_type order by log_time desc,yxb desc
